attributes.action: Refrain from risking British Personnel in a war with Iran, by using stand off weaponry (trident)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not wish to risk a single UK life through needless concern for an enemy, just drop one or two on them and hey presto we have a friendly country, after all look what it did for Japan.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
